short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan Walmart products in seconds and discover what's profitable to resell on Amazon using Nepeto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine trying to find a winning product from Walmart and checking each product manually... so exhausting. Nepeto is an Amazon sourcing software, and we have a lead list of tens of thousands of profitable deals our algorithm found. On our website, we showcase all the products in a user-friendly table. This Chrome extension scans Walmart for you and tells you if a product is profitable to resell on Amazon. Go ahead and use it. It's free!

For other Nepeto features and products: https://www.nepeto.com/
Thanks!
